verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>letter<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> which were carried away <S%H1473>captives<s%>, and to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

<S%H310>(After<s%> that <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and the <S%H1377>queen<s%>, and the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and the <S%H4525>smiths<s%>, were <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;)

By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H501>Elasah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H1587>Gemariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, (whom <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>) <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto all that are carried away <S%H1473>captives<s%>, whom I have caused to be carried <S%H1540>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;
<S%H1129>Build<s%> ye <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them;

<S%H3947>Take<s%> ye <S%H802>wives<s%>, and <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H582>husbands<s%>, that they may <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1121>daughters<s%>; that ye may be <S%H7235>increased<s%> there, and not <S%H4591>diminished<s%>.

And <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> whither I have caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captives<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for it: for in the <S%H7965>peace<s%> thereof shall ye have <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

¶ For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Let not your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7080>diviners<s%>, that be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you, <S%H5377>deceive<s%> you, neither <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to your <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which ye cause to be <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>.
For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> unto you in my <S%H8034>name<s%>: I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, That <S%H6310>after<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and <S%H6965>perform<s%> my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> toward you, in causing you to <S%H7725>return<s%> to this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> that I <S%H2803>think<s%> toward you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and not of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you an <S%H8615>expected<s%> <S%H319>end<s%>.
Then shall ye <S%H7121>call<s%> upon me, and ye shall <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto me, and I will <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto you.
And ye shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> me, and <S%H4672>find<s%> me, when ye shall <S%H1875>search<s%> for me with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And I will be <S%H4672>found<s%> of you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and I will turn <S%H7725>away<s%> your <S%H7622%H7622>captivity<s%>, and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and from all the <S%H4725>places<s%> whither I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and I will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H4725>place<s%> whence I caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>.
¶ Because ye have <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath raised us <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

Know that thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> that are not gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> with you into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>;

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> upon them the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and will <S%H5414>make<s%> them like <S%H8182>vile<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, that cannot be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are so <S%H7455>evil<s%>.

And I will <S%H7291>persecute<s%> <S%H310>them<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, with the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189%H2113>removed<s%> to all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to be a <S%H423>curse<s%>, and an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and an <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whither I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them:

Because they have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which I <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto them by my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them; but ye would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all ye of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, whom I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah<s%>, and of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> unto you in my <S%H8034>name<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and he shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

And of them shall be taken <S%H3947>up<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> by all the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> which are in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> thee like <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> and like <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>;

Because they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5039>villany<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbours'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, and have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; even I <S%H3045>know<s%>, and am a <S%H5707>witness<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ Thus shalt thou also <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>speaketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Because thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and to all the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>made<s%> thee <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the stead of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that ye should be <S%H6496>officers<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, for every <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7696>mad<s%>, and maketh himself a <S%H5012>prophet<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H4115>prison<s%>, and in the <S%H6729>stocks<s%>.
Now therefore why hast thou not <S%H1605>reproved<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H6069>Anathoth<s%>, which maketh himself a <S%H5012>prophet<s%> to you?

For therefore he <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto us in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1931>This<s%> captivity is <S%H752>long<s%>: <S%H1129>build<s%> ye <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them.
And <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H5612>letter<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>.
¶ Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7971>Send<s%> to all them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>; Because that <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> hath <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> unto you, and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> him not, and he caused you to <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie<s%>:

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%>: he shall not have a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>; neither shall he <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I will <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; because he hath <S%H1696>taught<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
